channel.title: Gehenna - Hern [Experimental/Ambient Album]
channel.description:
New album on my experimental second account. I have put off releasing this for too long, and I just needed to post it somewhere. An experimental album with a horror theme. This is maybe my most focused project yet and I had a lot of fun making it.
(34:45) Link is here:
https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sets/gehenna
Album art is here:
![image0%20(23)|500x500](upload://q0gsvSL38JYKMxDYoZhspkeRxqG.jpeg)
This is not an album for everybody, but I hope at least someone finds enjoyment in it. Constructive criticism is always welcomed.
